directions: In a large wok or skillet heat oil over medium heat; saute onions until translucent.  Stir in creamed corn and curry paste.  Cook, stirring regularly, for 5 minutes.  As you stir, add salt, pepper and garlic.
Stir in garbanzo beans and gently fold in tofu.  Add spinach and cover.  When spinach is tender, remove from heat and stir in basil.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste
1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and rinsed
1 teaspoon dried basil or to taste
title: Spinach Chickpea Curry
